item.description: Come to share your music or just to listen and enjoy. The show is free and runs from 7:00 to 9:30 pm. The sign-ups start at 6:15. If you are taking the T, Java Jo's is directly across the street from the Forest Hills T Station. If you are driving, the parking is in the rear... you have to drive past the place, turn left and then pull into what seems like a funeral home parking lot. The coffee shop is very nice and has a good menu as well!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be carrying a tiny guitar case and a striped purse.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Java Jo Open Mic
